name: check_port
description: Check if a specific TCP/UDP port is currently in use or listening.

verbose.description: Show the process name/PID using the port (requires sudo/permissions often).

name: clipboard_read
description: Read the current content of the user's system clipboard (Control+C).

name: clipboard_write
description: Write text to the system clipboard (Linux/macOS). Useful for passing code/commands to the user.

text.description: The text content to copy to clipboard.

name: demo_js
description: Demonstrate how to create a tool using Javascript and how to use comments.

string_enum.description: Define a required string property with enum

array.description: Define a required string array property

array_optional.description: Define a optional string array property

name: demo_py
description: Demonstrate how to create a tool using Python and how to use comments.

string_enum.description: Define a required string property with enum

array.description: Define a required string array property

array_optional.description: Define a optional string array property

name: demo_sh
description: Demonstrate how to create a tool using Bash and how to use comment tags.

string_enum.description: Define a required string property with enum

array.description: Define a required string array property

array_optional.description: Define a optional string array property

name: desktop_notify
description: Send a desktop notification to the user. Use this when a long-running task is complete.

message.description: The body text of the notification.

name: execute_command
description: Execute the shell command.

name: execute_js_code
description: Execute the javascript code in node.js.

code.description: Javascript code to execute, such as `console.log("hello world")`

name: execute_py_code
description: Execute the python code.

code.description: Python code to execute, such as `print("hello world")`

name: execute_sql_code
description: Execute the sql code.

name: fetch_url_via_curl
description: Extract the content from a given URL.

name: fetch_url_via_jina
description: Extract the content from a given URL.

name: fs_cat
description: Read the contents of a file at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file to read

name: fs_find
description: Search for files or directories matching a pattern. Essential for locating code or configs.

path.description: The root path to start searching from (e.g., "." or "/var/log").

max_depth.description: Limit the directory traversal depth (default: 5 to prevent infinite loops).

name: fs_ls
description: List all files and directories at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the directory to list

name: fs_mkdir
description: Create a new directory at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the directory to create

name: fs_patch
description: Apply a patch to a file at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file to apply to

contents.description: The patch to apply to the file

name: fs_read_range
description: Read a specific range of lines from a file. Useful for reading large logs or files without overloading context.

file_path.description: The path to the file to read.

start_line.description: The line number to start reading from (1-based index).

end_line.description: The line number to stop reading at.

name: fs_rm
description: Remove the file or directory at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file or directory to remove

name: fs_write
description: Write the full file contents to a file at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file to write to

contents.description: The full contents to write to the file

name: get_current_time
description: Get the current time.

name: get_current_weather
description: Get the current weather in a given location.

location.description: The city and optionally the state or country, e.g., "London", "San Francisco, CA".

name: git_diff
description: Show changes between commits, commit and working tree, etc.

staged.description: Show changes that are staged for commit.

target.description: The specific file or branch to diff (optional).

name: git_log
description: Show the commit logs.

max_count.description: Limit the number of commits to show (default: 5).

oneline.description: Compress each commit to a single line.

stat.description: Include a diffstat (summary of changed files) for each commit.

name: git_status
description: Check the status of the current git repository to see modified, staged, or untracked files.

short.description: Give the output in the short-format.

name: html_to_markdown
description: Fetch a webpage and convert it to clean Markdown. Best for reading documentation or articles.

selector.description: CSS selector to extract (default: 'body', use 'main' or 'article' for better focus).

name: json_select
description: Parse JSON data/files using jq to extract specific fields.

json.description: The raw JSON string or path to a JSON file (use @filepath).

name: media_get_metadata
description: Extract comprehensive metadata from media files (images, video, audio) using exiftool.

file.description: The path to the media file.

specific.description: Extract only common timestamps, duration, and geo-data to save context tokens.

name: search_arxiv
description: Search arXiv for a query and return the top papers.

name: search_wikipedia
description: Search Wikipedia for a query.

name: search_wolframalpha
description: Get an answer to a question using Wolfram Alpha. Input should the query in English.

name: sec_check_users
description: List currently logged in users, recent successful logins, and failed login attempts.

failed.description: Show failed login attempts matching recent history (potential intrusion).

verbose.description: Show full detail of current sessions including source IP.

name: sec_dns_integrity
description: Audit DNS integrity by comparing local resolution vs trusted upstream resolvers (Quad9/Google). Detects /etc/hosts poisoning.

domain.description: The reference domain to check (default: google.com).

name: sec_integrity_verify
description: Verify integrity of system config files. Scans for files that have changed from the installed package defaults.

all.description: Verify all installed packages (Slow! Use with caution).

package.description: Limit verification to a specific package (e.g. openssh-server, sudo).

name: sec_list_suid
description: Find files with SUID active. These run with root file permissions and are common privilege escalation vectors.

path.description: The root path to search (default: /usr/bin). Limit this to verify questionable directories.

name: sec_listening_summary
description: List network services listening for incoming connections. Distinguishes between local and public exposure.

public_only.description: Show only services listening on 0.0.0.0 or [::] (Exposed to LAN/WAN).

name: sec_process_audit
description: Audit processes for tampering indicators like LD_PRELOAD injection or suspicious ptrace tracing.

full.description: Scan all processes (requires elevated privileges/sudo often).

name: sec_textscan_injection
description:
Scan text content for potential Prompt Injection or Jailbreak patterns. 
Use before processing untrusted external files/logs with the Agent.

name: send_mail
description: Send a email.

name: send_twilio
description: Send SMS or Twilio Messaging Channels messages using Twilio API.

to_number.description: The recipient's phone number. Prefix with 'whatsapp:' for WhatsApp messages, e.g. whatsapp:+1234567890

message.description: The content of the message to be sent

name: sys_disk_usage
description: Estimate file space usage (du). Identifies large directories.

path.description: The directory to analyze (default: current directory).

depth.description: Display only a total for each directory to this depth (default: 1).

human_readable.description: Print sizes in human readable format (e.g., 1K 234M 2G).

name: sys_info
description: Get a snapshot of system health including CPU load, memory usage, and disk space.

verbose.description: Include detailed process list (top 5 by CPU).

name: sys_list_processes
description: List currently running processes with optional filtering.

name: text_count_tokens
description: Count the number of tokens in a text string. Useful for checking if data fits in context window.

model.description: The model encoding to use (default: gpt-4).

name: web_search_aichat
description: Perform a web search to get up-to-date information or additional context.

name: web_search_perplexity
description: Perform a web search using Perplexity API to get up-to-date information or additional context.

name: web_search_tavily
description: Perform a web search using Tavily API to get up-to-date information or additional context.
